about: 6D Global Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: SIXD)  is a strategic holding company founded by Silicon Valley entrepreneurs with offices in California, Ohio, and New York. The company manages a portfolio of fast growing digital business solutions companies who deliver top performing people with skills and experience in the key digital technology areas that enterprise-class organizations demand during critical changes and growth.  Working collaboratively with enterprise marketing, sales, and IT teams, 6D Global Technologies’ companies help clients optimize digital business channels and create better experiences for their customers, resulting in increased revenue growth and market share. 6D Global Technologies is accountable to its clients, partners, and employees by honoring its commitments, providing measurable results, and striving for the highest quality of service based on loyalty and integrity. Founded 2004 in CA by Tejune Kang, a Korean American entrepreneur born in the Silicon Valley and former PeopleSoft/Oracle Corporation strategist and engineer. Founded 2004 in CA by Tejune Kang, a Korean American entrepreneur born in the Silicon Valley and former PeopleSoft/Oracle Corporation strategist and engineer. Serving Fortune1000 clients across all verticals including, high-tech, manufacturing, retail, leisure, healthcare, telecomm, government, and higher education. One of America’s fastest growing companies, 6D started as an ERP/BI consulting company and has evolved to full-service enterprise-class digital technology solutions company.
